Package by.rozmysl.bookingServlet.dao.user

Interface UserDao

All Superinterfaces:
Dao<User,​java.lang.String>
All Known Implementing Classes:
UserDaoImp
public interface UserDao
extends Dao<User,​java.lang.String>
Provides the base model DAO interface for `USER` table.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean activateUser​(java.lang.String code)
    Tries to activate the User.
    int countUsersPages​(int rows)
    Counts the number of pages in the 'USER` table
    User save​(User user, java.lang.String language)
    Saves the User in the `USER` table

    Methods inherited from interface by.rozmysl.bookingServlet.dao.Dao

    delete, getAll, getById, save

  • Method Details

    • save

      User save​(User user, java.lang.String language) throws java.sql.SQLException, javax.mail.MessagingException
      Saves the User in the `USER` table
      Parameters:
      user - User
      language - User's language
      Returns:
      User object
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if there was an error accessing the database
      javax.mail.MessagingException - if the message cannot be created

    • countUsersPages

      int countUsersPages​(int rows) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Counts the number of pages in the 'USER` table
      Parameters:
      rows - number of rows per page
      Returns:
      number of pages
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if there was an error accessing the database

    • activateUser

      boolean activateUser​(java.lang.String code) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Tries to activate the User. If successful, it saves the result in the `USER` table
      Parameters:
      code - User's activation code
      Returns:
      verification result
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if there was an error accessing the database
